name: Far Above (The Surface Awaits)
description:
A game starts at an underwater exploration base during Victorian times. Things are not looking well, and as the base collapses, 2 people escape in the only surviving escape pod. Will they make it out alive to deliver the research?

The goal of the game is to get above the surface. It has been designed as a 2-player coop game, but can be played solo.

made for #createjamfall2017

Programming: Theodor Purcaru, Sebastian Raaberg Baasch.

Sound and juice: Mark Nielsen

Art: Austeja Vaicyte, Natalija Martiuk, Michelle Sørensen
